relnotes.name: Timezone
relnotes.purpose: It allows application clients to configure the time-zone on the Phone and convert time between UTC and Wall-clock for any zone supported in its time-zone database. It is developed in response to PREQ 663 â€“ Daylight Saving Time.
relnotes.minorchange: Fix for PDEF102995-[ONB Regressions] TzLocalizationTest -- false pass result Added routine to check if the bad DB file to be tested has already existed in the disk.
